name: WiiU or 3DS Texture File
summary: A JTEX file is a texture used by a Nintendo WiiU or 3DS video game. It contains a "skin" that is applied to an in-game character, item, or location. JTEX files are most notably used in Wii Fit U, Dragon Ball Fusions, and One Piece: Super Grand Battle! X.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
